template.name: Android Things Empty Activity
template.description: Creates a new empty activity for Android Things

parameter.name: Activity Name
parameter.help: The name of the activity class to create

parameter.name: Launch activity automatically on boot
parameter.help: This is the home activity, that is the first activity that is displayed when the device boots.

parameter.name: Generate a UI layout File
parameter.help: If true, a layout file will be generated. Android Things devices don't require a display, so UI is optional.

parameter.name: Layout Name
parameter.help: The name of the UI layout to create for the activity
